summary: A down-and-out restaurateur and his neighbor hatch a plan to lure luminaries to their small Newfoundland town.
cast: William Hurt|Andy Jones|Molly Parker|Vicky Hynes|Greg Malone|Michael Chiasson|Barry Newhook|Laura Tobin|Maggie Meyer|Frankie O'Neill|Lawrence Barry|Leah Lewis|Todd Perrin|Deidre Gillard-Rowlings|Matthew Clarke|John Moyes|Sheila McCarthy|Bryan Hennessey|Pete Soucy|George Jonas|Mark Critch|Mack Furlong
title: El secreto de mi vecino
